genericName: Kud-Loh-Kan, King of the Deku Scrubs
description: Kud-Loh-Kan, King of the Deku Scrubs.
tooltip: Select Kud-Loh-Kan, King of the Deku Scrubs as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: King Kud-Loh-Kan focuses on empowering creature units.
Allows you to King Kud-Loh-Kan, a support hero that influences other troops.
Hovering creature unit that spawns a swarm of larva.
All Creature Upgrades (Except for Mad Healing) are researched for free and immediately upon reaching City Phase.
Regeneration rate of all Creature units is improved.
